Taylor's Services
home / Taylor's Services
A full service hair lounge for men, women & kids
Taylor’s Barbershop is a unique, sleek, upbeat and innovative barbershop space to give you a feel of comfort, fun and relaxation.

Deana M.
barber stylist / manager

Born in Virginia, College and Cosmetology School Graduate. Working on dual licensing. Female Barber + Stylist.

Jessica M.
barber

Jessica’s hair journey began in 2011 in rural Virginia. She strives for excellence in unisex grooming with specialization in color, styling, and hair cutting for a widely multicultural client base

Shawnee S.
barber stylist / manager

Born in Atlanta, where my love for hair and beauty emerged. Cosmetology and Barber School graduate and currently thriving as a female barber.

Shomari F.
barber

My name is Shomari. I’ve been in the barber business for 9 years. I got into this industry because I enjoy making people feel good. I really enjoy what I do and giving people a good experience when they sit in my chair.

Theron
barber

Licensed since 2004. I enjoy working with my hands and helping others look their best.

Thomas
barber

Born and raised in Richmond, Va. Graduated from barber school in 2018. I have a passion for helping others and look forward to doing so for years to come.

Wathiq A.
barber

Born and raised in Iraq. I learned barbering as a teenager from my uncle, and carried my pursuit on to the U.S. when I arrived in 2015.
